name: Fantasy Farm: valley of pixel crops
name_original: Fantasy Farm: valley of pixel crops
description:
A simple simulator in pixel art style that will allow you to enjoy the life of a farmer.

You are not alone.

-Tired of watering your crops? Hire and upgrade workers - let them do it for you.

-The most experienced of them can harvest twice the crops!

Further more.

-Starting with growing tomatoes, you will discover more and more seeds and animals,

the old farmer will share the seeds with you in exchange for a couple of carrots.

Not just a crops.

-Over time, you will open access to fields where you can keep animals and even a cave where the most exotic crops grow.

Take a break from the hustle and bustle.

-Just have fun watching your workers till the fields and expand your farm!
